name: Zombie Smash (PC)
description:
The Zombie Apocalypse destroyed mankind. The few survivors battled each other for many years, leading humanity to the brink of extinction. After years of war, a pact was created between the clans. For this pact to work, the clans agreed to hold the "Zombie Games" where criminals from all clans are pit together with zombies for entertainment.

You have been deemed a criminal and sent to the Zombie Forest. Survive and you will be free, fail and you die. 

Controls:

Space = Shoot

W A S D keys = Move

Take pistols to reload.

Tip: Use walls and obstacles to your advantage
